LinearRegression Class Reference

Linear regression analysis of given value pairs. More...

#include <LinearRegression.hh>

Public Member Functions

void reset ()
 initialise for a analysis of a new value set.
LinearRegression & add (Double_t x, Double_t y, Double_t y_error)
 Add a value pair where the second values has the given uncertainty.
LinearRegression & add (Double_t x, Double_t y)
 Add a value pair (if the uncertainty of the y-values is not known or are all the same).
LinearRegression & add (const LinearRegression &a)
 Add the values of another regression object to this object.
LinearRegression & subtract (Double_t x, Double_t y, Double_t y_error)
 Remove a value pair from the object.
LinearRegression & subtract (Double_t x, Double_t y)
 Remove a value pair from the object (if the value pair has been added without specifying an uncertainty) May be called after an object has been added without specifying the uncertainty to remove it.
LinearRegression & Subtract (const LinearRegression &a)
 Remove all value pairs added to another regression object from this regression object.
LinearRegression & calc ()
 Calculate the ascent and the offset.
LinearRegression & calcWithErrors ()
 Calculate the ascent and the offset and their errors.

 Return the calculated ascent.

 Calculate the best guess of y for the given value of x.
Double_t evalError (Double_t x, Double_t x_ref)
 Calculate the uncertainty of a certain y for the given value of x.
Double_t evalError (Double_t x)
 Calculate the uncertainty of a certain y for the given value of x.
Double_t sumOfWeights ()
 Sum of the inverse uncertainties of the given y-values.

Detailed Description

Linear regression analysis of given value pairs.

Double_t LinearRegression::ascent (  )  [inline]

Return the calculated ascent.

The result is undefined before calc or calcWithErrors was called.

Definition at line 142 of file LinearRegression.hh.

Double_t LinearRegression::eval ( Double_t  x  )  [inline]

Calculate the best guess of y for the given value of x.

Calcualte offset()+ascent()*x; The result is undefined before calc or calcWithErrors was called.

Definition at line 165 of file LinearRegression.hh.

Double_t LinearRegression::evalError ( Double_t  x,
Double_t  x_ref 
) [inline]

Calculate the uncertainty of a certain y for the given value of x.

Parameters:
x the x value for which the uncertainty on y should be calculated
x_ref the x value at which the uncertainty is only given by the uncertainty of the offset() should be the average x value of the input set. The result is undefined before calc or calcWithErrors was called.
